about_the_game:
Politica is an addictive mini-simulation game that will transport you to the heart of Italy in the 80s, an era of unbridled politics, dark intrigues and powerful alliances.

In this addictive video game, you will play the role of a skilled lobbyist with the arduous task of navigating through the intricate maze of Italian politics. The goal? Accumulate as much money and power as possible, exploiting cunning, political relations and unscrupulous lobbying tactics.

Face the political frenzy of the 1980s, a time of power games, corruption, and ever-changing alliances. Slip into the corridors of power, participate in exclusive worldly parties, and put in place lobbying strategies to get political favors that will give you wealth and influence.

You’ll have to juggle an intricate system of political relationships, forge alliances with key figures and manipulate events for your own advantage. Build your network of contacts, accumulate resources and skillfully exploit your rivals to emerge as the most feared and respected lobbyist of the time.

But beware, every decision will have consequences, and your destiny will be shaped by your choices. Risk everything for risky operations, or take a more cautious approach to consolidating your position in the political underworld.
